Package net.minecraft.util

Interface RandomSource

public interface RandomSource 
NMS abstraction for generating random resources and values

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    GAUSSIAN_SPREAD_FACTOR
    Deprecated.
    Unused internally and generally unreliable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    consumeCount(int count)
    Consumes the given number of random numbers.
    static RandomSource
    create()
    Creates a new random generator with no seed.
    static void
    create(long seed)
    Creates a new random generator with the given seed.
    static RandomSource
    createNewThreadLocalInstance()
    Creates a new thread-safe random generator with its seed based on the thread's random generator.
    static RandomSource
    createThreadSafe()
    Deprecated.
    Use RandomSource#createNewThreadLocalInstance() to use the thread's seed instead of a random one
    abstract RandomSource
    fork()
    Clones this random generator.
    abstract net.minecraft.world.level.levelgen.PositionalRandomFactory
    forkPositional()
    Clones this random factory to a positional one.
    abstract double
    nextDouble()
    Generates a random double between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
    abstract float
    nextFloat()
    Generates a random float between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
    abstract double
    nextGaussian()
    Generates a random double using a gaussian distribution.
    abstract int
    nextInt()
    Generates a random integer.
    abstract int
    nextInt(int bound)
    Generates a random integer between 0 (inclusive) and the given bound (exclusive).
    abstract int
    nextInt(int min, int max)
    Generates a random integer between the given bounds (inclusive and exclusive).
    default int
    nextIntBetweenInclusive(int min, int max)
    Generates a random integer between the given bounds (inclusive).
    abstract long
    nextLong()
    Generates a random long.
    abstract void
    setSeed(long seed)
    Sets the seed of this random generator.
    default double
    triangle(double min, double mod)
    Generates a random double with a minimum and a modifier multiplied by a random number.

  • Field Detail

    • GAUSSIAN_SPREAD_FACTOR

      @Deprecated
      static final double GAUSSIAN_SPREAD_FACTOR
      Deprecated.
      Unused internally and generally unreliable
      The spread factor for the gaussian distribution used by the random generator
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • consumeCount

      public default void consumeCount(int count)
      Consumes the given number of random numbers.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of random numbers to consume.

    • create

      public static RandomSource create()
      Creates a new random generator with no seed.
      Returns:
      A new random generator

    • create

      public static void create(long seed)
      Creates a new random generator with the given seed.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed to use for the random generator

    • createNewThreadLocalInstance

      public static RandomSource createNewThreadLocalInstance()
      Creates a new thread-safe random generator with its seed based on the thread's random generator.
      Returns:
      A new thread-safe random generator

    • createThreadSafe

      @Deprecated
      public static RandomSource createThreadSafe()
      Deprecated.
      Use RandomSource#createNewThreadLocalInstance() to use the thread's seed instead of a random one
      Creates a thread-safe new random generator with a random seed.
      Returns:
      A new thread-safe random generator

    • fork

      public abstract RandomSource fork()
      Clones this random generator.
      Returns:
      A new random generator with the same seed as this one

    • forkPositional

      public abstract net.minecraft.world.level.levelgen.PositionalRandomFactory forkPositional()
      Clones this random factory to a positional one.
      Returns:
      A new positional random factory with the same seed as this one
